summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1933, for the improvement of Corliss Avenue from North Fortieth Street to North Forty-first Street, in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks and wooden crosswalks thereon, with necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 20051, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
